generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and traffic flowing in both directions.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs.
- building: Several buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the road and in the background, providing greenery.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Pedestrians can be seen walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street at a crosswalk.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle on the right side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a blue Smart car in the foreground and other vehicles in traffic.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead, showing red signals.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including directional signs and regulatory signs mounted on poles.
- pole: Several poles are visible, supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- bicycle: A bicycle is being ridden by a person on the right side of the road.
